messages.content: How do I clone the ComfyUI-TostAI repository?
Clone the ComfyUI-TostAI repository by cloning the URL `https://github.com/camenduru/ComfyUI-TostAI` into your ComfyUI `custom_nodes` folder.
For which operating systems can I install the tost service?
You can install the tost service on Windows, Linux, and Mac.
What is the purpose of the `cloudflared.exe service install` command?
The `cloudflared.exe service install` command is used to install the tost service on Windows.
cloudflare is a service mentioned in the instructions for installing the tost service on all three operating systems mentioned.
A ComfyUI-TostAI extension is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows for small variations in the initial noise.
How is the initial noise generated in the ComfyUI-TostAI extension?
The initial noise is generated based on the `variation_seed` and `seed` parameters using the formula `random_based_on(variation_seed) * x + random_based_on(seed) * (1-x)`.
What is the YouTube tutorial mentioned in the document?
The YouTube tutorial is not mentioned in the document.
How do I uninstall the tost service?
To uninstall the tost service: For Windows, run `cloudflared.exe service uninstall`. For Linux and Mac, run `sudo cloudflared service uninstall`.
